Name: Sample modpack
Description: An example used to demonstrate how to make a modpack

Mods.Name: The first mod
Mods.Description: The mod that will be applied first

Mods.Name: Disabled mod
Mods.Description: A mod that won't be run unless overridden by the user in a UI

Mods.Name: The last mod
Mods.Description: This mod will be applied last because the order of mods matters
